Description: Iron buckle made in one piece except for the single iron pin. A leather strap is looped through the attachment ring of the buckle and sewn with leather stitching. The buckle and stub of the strap have been deliberately cut with a knife from the rest of the strap.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), Lower Cathedral Street south end rubble fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
